# The `AAInstanceInfo` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

An abstract interface to track if a value leaves it&#39;s defining function instance. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

An abstract interface to track if a value leaves it&#39;s defining function instance.

TODO: We should make it a ternary <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aa">AA</a> tracking uniqueness, and uniqueness wrt. the <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/attributor">Attributor</a> analysis separately.

Definition at line 4319 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/attributor-h">Attributor.h</a>.

### isAssumedUniqueForAnalysis() {#a61ebacb3626c93a0a9b38f4813ecf1e0}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::AAInstanceInfo::isAssumedUniqueForAnalysis () const"
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Return true if we assume that the underlying value is unique in its scope wrt.

the <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/attributor">Attributor</a> analysis. That means it might not be unique but we can still use pointer equality without risking to represent two instances with one <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">llvm::Value</a></code>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/attributor-h/#l04333">4333</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/attributor-h">Attributor.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### isKnownUniqueForAnalysis() {#a37ba04bbdabb03a673f8e94e8f5cf044}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::AAInstanceInfo::isKnownUniqueForAnalysis () const"
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Return true if we know that the underlying value is unique in its scope wrt.

the <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/attributor">Attributor</a> analysis. That means it might not be unique but we can still use pointer equality without risking to represent two instances with one <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">llvm::Value</a></code>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/attributor-h/#l04327">4327</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/attributor-h">Attributor.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
